items.sentence: Tom is hoping that he'll be given a second chance.
I don't think Tom knows why Mary doesn't like him.
I don't think Tom knows where Mary went to school.
Tom told me that he thought that he could do that.
Tom told me he thinks that he's going to die soon.
Tom told me he thinks that he'll do that tomorrow.
Mary told me she wanted Tom to buy her a necklace.
Tom swore that Mary told him that she'd done that.
There's a possibility Tom isn't going to be there.
It's half an hour's walk from here to the station.
Tom says that he hasn't gotten anything from Mary.
According to experts, that isn't likely to happen.
I suspect Tom needs to do that sometime this week.
I suspect Tom and Mary were surprised to see John.
I suspect Tom and Mary want us to help them today.
I suspect Tom and Mary need to do that right away.
I suspect Tom and Mary both have to do that today.
I know that Tom doesn't like me, but I don't care.
Tom discovered swallows nesting inside the garage.
Tom's closet is full of junk that he doesn't need.
